nodes.text: Tikiar was a Mekuun Corporation starfighter.
The Tikiars were sleek, dark, two-person starfighters named after the Tikiarri. Their thrusters made unique quintuple starburst patterns.

They were used by the Judicial Forces at the time of the Battle of Naboo. Also the House Vandron used this type of starfighters. In 33 BBY, the House Vandron used the starfighters to escort the Prominence and the Ecliptic to the planet Asmeru. But when the Nebula Front took over the escort, the Tikiars flew away.
During the years of the New Republic, they were a favorite of the noble houses of Senex sector; House Vandron had a large fleet of them.
